bar*/%%00010/* Add a black background color to the top navigation bar */%%00010.topnav2 {%%00010 overflow: hidden;%%00010 background-color: #e9e9e9;%%00010 height: 49.5px;%%00010}%%00010/* Style the links inside the navigation bar */%%00010.topnav2 a {%%00010 float: left;%%00010 display: block;%%00010 color: black;%%00010 text-align: center;%%00010 padding: 14px 16px;%%00010 text-decoration: none;%%00010 font-size: 17px;%%00010}%%00010/* Change the color of links on hover */%%00010.topnav2 a:hover {%%00010 background-color: #ddd;%%00010 color: black;%%00010}%%00010/* Style the "active" element to highlight the current page */%%00010.topnav2 a.active {%%00010 background-color: #2196F3;%%00010 color: white;%%00010}%%00010/* Style the search box inside the navigation bar */%%00010.topnav2 .search-container {%%00010 float: left;%%00010 margin-left: 16px;%%00010}%%00010%%00010.topnav2 input[type=text]{%%00010 padding: 6px;%%00010 margin-top: 8px;%%00010 font-size: 17px;%%00010 border: none;%%00010}%%00010%%00010.topnav2 .search-container button {%%00010 float: right;%%00010 padding: 6px 10px;%%00010 margin-top: 8px;%%00010 margin-right: 16px;%%00010 background: #d7d7d7;%%00010 font-size: 17px;%%00010 border: none;%%00010 cursor: pointer;%%00010%%00010}%%00010%%00010.topnav2 .search-container button:hover {%%00010 background: #ccc;%%00010}%%00010/* When the screen is less than 600px wide, stack the links and the search field vertically instead of horizontally */%%00010@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {%%00010 .topnav2 .search-container {%%00010 float: none;%%00010 }%%00010 .topnav2 a, .topnav2 input[type=text], .topnav2 .search-container button {%%00010 float: none;%%00010 display: block;%%00010 text-align: left;%%00010 width: 100%;%%00010 margin: 0;%%00010 padding: 14px;%%00010 }%%00010 .topnav2 input[type=text] {%%00010 border: 1px solid #ccc;%%00010 }%%00010}%%00010%%00010%%00010/*Rows*/%%00010%%00010/* Float four columns side by side */%%00010.column {%%00010 float: left;%%00010 width: 25%;%%00010 padding: 0 10px;%%00010}%%00010%%00010/* Remove extra left and right margins, due to padding in columns */%%00010.row {%%00010 margin: 0 -5px;%%00010}%%00010%%00010/* Clear floats after the columns */%%00010.row:after {%%00010 content: "";%%00010 display: table;%%00010 clear: both;%%00010%%00010}%%00010%%00010/* Style the counter cards */%%00010.card {%%00010 box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); /* this adds the "card" effect */%%00010 padding: 16px;%%00010 text-align: center;%%00010 background-color: #f1f1f1;%%00010 margin-bottom: 16px;%%00010 scroll-behavior: smooth;%%00010}%%00010%%00010/* Responsive columns - one column layout (vertical) on small screens */%%00010@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {%%00010 .column {%%00010 width: 100%;%%00010 display: block;%%00010 margin-bottom: 20px;%%00010 }%%00010}
